name: Tiles (itch) (SleepwalkerGames)
description:
Tiles is spiritually a 2d version of the Rubik's cube, creating a very similar experience where you will have to learn and create algorithms. As the levels get bigger, not ruining what you already have solved becomes another challenge as well.

Throughout the game, tiles are introduced with special properties that dramatically change how the level is played, in new exciting ways.
